text: Rawalpindi District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Rawalpindi is the capital. The district is divided into seven tehsils, these are: * Gujar Khan Tehsil * Kahuta Tehsil * Kallar Syedan Tehsil * Kotli Sattian Tehsil * Murree Tehsil * Rawalpindi Tehsil * Taxila Tehsil In 1901 Punjab Census, the Sikhs numbered 26,363, Hindus 57,325, and the Muslims being 466,918 83%. But between 1901 and 1931, there was a large number of Hindus converting to Sikhism. By 1947, there would have been more than 100,000 Sikhs In this district, and also the population growing. Category:Districts of British India Category:Rawalpindi District Category:Rawalpindi Division
title: Rawalpindi District
